name: Fork (itch)
description:
An Australian game made in one week by a team of three. Arrow or WASD keys to move. E key to interact. 

You’re from the future and must alter the past to prevent the apocalypse. Feelings of ground hog day mixed with the butterfly effect. 

“The future is just as you imagined it… or it is? You only have a short time before you're ripped back into your timeline “ 

The game is set in the future, played in the past.  What doesn’t feel quite right in the future can be changed... or can it?  This is a top down story with interactive dialogue with branching storylines. Your only option is to roam the town and change the past to prevent the future.  Five outcomes, only one ending. 

This is our first submission into Brackey’s game jam and first top down. Please let us know your thoughts. We hope you enjoy!

Theme: 'Rewind'

Please follow us on Twitter @castle_chicken

Characters and main map by artist @zebtopia

Copywrite:  Apocalyptic songs, French Gypsy and Romanian Horra and Bulgar by Baltic Bar Mitzvah. 

Town Music: Laying Low by Admiral Bob (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license.  Ft: Apoxode
